评论概述: Ok not great, but fine for the money

I don't think they'd go up to a 37", but if you're a 36", you might be okay. The neck measurement of the size he got is bigger than his actual neck measurement, but I'm not sure how they're measuring since the sleeve is bizarro.  The fabric is meh. It is NOT soft. It has that polyester texture that you don't want - that not all polyester actually has, by the way. It does have some stretch, but not tons, just as you'd expect for a button-down that has some spandex content in the fabric.  For $15, it's not bad.

评论概述: Good shirt, be sure of the sizing
评论详情: Overall, this is a good shirt. It's nice enough to wear to the office and feels comfortable. The collar does not have stays in it, and there are no slots for putting your own in, so you will have to rely on the fabric alone to keep its shape. The buttons are well attached and are nicely black (I hate black shirts with white buttons!) and the stitching overall is good. The material is slightly stretchy, so its has enough give to fit comfortably. Note on the sizing: I got a "small," which was the smallest size offered. I am 5'9" and weigh 140, with a 36" chest. The product page lists the small as having a 43.3" chest measurement, so it's a little baggy on my frame. That's not a fault with the product, it's just that it may not fit you trimly if you are my size. It does fit well on my friend, who is about a 42" chest.
